Azure:
This page enumerates the native security controls available on the Azure platform that have been mapped to [MITRE ATT&CK](https://attack.mitre.org/).
Most controls included in scope were derived from the [Azure Security Benchmark (v2)](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/security/benchmarks/overview) and our own independent research.
AWS:
This page enumerates the native security controls available on the Amazon Web Services (AWS) platform that have been mapped to [MITRE ATT&CK](https://attack.mitre.org/).
Most controls included in scope were derived from the [Security, Identity, and Compliance on AWS](https://aws.amazon.com/products/security/?nc=sn&loc=2) page and our own independent research.
